data.message: Em is great but, 2pac is the greatest.

replies.message: Pac would rip up em, if eminem was black he wouldn't be nearly as famous, pac did almost more in 5 years than eminem has in his 17 years

@Ayoub if 2pac was able to handle the east coast by himself,  he would eat Eminem for a snack and keep going. 2pac is more hardworking than Eminem, the dude recorded over 200 tracks in the last year of his life, 2pac's lyrics are relevant to today. Like snoop said 2pac is the greatest to do it and he said it puts 2pac on the level of a god what he was able to predict in his songs. Eminem isn't on that level.
Someone sock Caiden in his biased fuckin mouth
No no no, 3PAC is the greatest
2pac started the book of rap and em finished it. I respect pac and love his music but Eminem in my opinion is the G.O.A.T. But I respect other peoples opinion when they argue that pac is better.

Both are lyrical geniuses in their own right!! 2 complete different styles of rap that can in instances create the same feeling... Although I do believe that if 2pac was still alive he would have changed the world!!

Nobody is on the level of pac and never wil be why is he better than others? He has made over 200 songs in the last year of his life and not one of them is a bad song look at the kim song by eminem he has made such mistakes in music alot of times the newer albums cant compete with any of the songs pac has made its not fair to compare eminem to pac because if pac wouldent have died the rap game would not have been what it is now so if we compare eminem and pac we cant realy take the mmlp2 album into the talk because thats a totaly different piece of pie and if you compare both of them than you could say they were on equal levels but thats not the case the average quality of a song of pac is higher and em just dous not come close and never will but its not fair to compare them they are 2 very different rappers

Pac's dead.. He was relevant, but not anymore.. Eminem is now. And in Twenty when someone comes along, and is better than both. What Then ? .. Its an endless discussion. And as mentioned above, EM and pac two different rappers, and background. Peaches to plummes ;)
haha where did you hear that? :))) pac is the past, em is the past present and by the way its going, he will be the future untill he hits 50-60 years old or who know :))
eminem is a pure rap genius tupac is shit......
Biggest argument i see here is Pac made 200 songs in a year... So this is a quantity over quality thing?
